i18n.title: Create Closable React Alert
i18n.description: In this lab, we will be creating a Closable Alert component using React. The component will allow users to display a message of a specific type and close the alert when they are done with it. By the end of this lab, you will have learned how to use the useState() and useEffect() hooks to create a dynamic component that can be easily customized to fit your needs.

meta.title: Closable Alert | React Component Development
meta.description: Learn how to create a dynamic and customizable Closable Alert component using React's useState and useEffect hooks. Enhance your web development skills with this comprehensive tutorial.
meta.keywords: React, Closable Alert, Component Development, useState, useEffect, Web Development

i18n.title: 创建可关闭的 React 警报
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将使用 React 创建一个可关闭的警报组件。该组件将允许用户显示特定类型的消息，并在使用完警报后将其关闭。在本实验结束时，你将学会如何使用 `useState()` 和 `useEffect()` 钩子来创建一个动态组件，该组件可以轻松定制以满足你的需求。
